name: Worrysome
description:
Worrysome is an action 2.5D sidescroller. Play through 4 Levels of the campaign and fight the Orc boss.  Utilize three weapon types: Sword and Shield, Bow and Arrow, and Staff. 

-Each weapon unlocks new abilities.

-Sword and shield is capable of slamming enemies to the ground and blocking projectiles.

-Bow and Arrows allow you to shoot rapidly at enemies and backflip while shooting to gain more distance from your foes.

-Staffs allow you to breathe fire and shoot fire balls as well as summon a shield in which melee enemies cannot enter for a short time.

-Multiple character customization options available. 

-Weapons are able to be purchased although at this time are only cosmetic

-Restore your health with potions from the alchemist from gold you've taken from your foes.

----Controls----

-WASD to move

-1/2/3 to select weapons

-Q/E to cycle spells with the staff

-Hold RMB to aim and LMB to shoot

-While holding RMB pressing LShift will perform a weapon specific attack

----Information----

I've made this project and wanted to see if there would be any more interest in it.  I envision a fast paced combat style in which you need to swap weapons on the fly and have access to more abilities. Please leave feedback here or email me @ Tennessippistudios@gmail.com.

Thank you for playing and any donations are GREATLY APPRECIATED!
